com.ikarus.solartaxi

Class Spaceship

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikarus.solartaxi.Spaceship

  • public class Spaceship
extends java.lang.Object
    Spaceship class for player controlled Taxi.
    Author:
    Nikolaus Leopold
    Battery charging related functionality by Sebastian Kirchner

    • Method Detail

      • applyThrust

        public void applyThrust(float thrustLeft,
               float thrustRight)
        Apply thrust to Spaceship, right and left thrusters can be set independently to control translation/rotation.
        Sets BitmapState for moving Spaceship.
        Parameters:
        thrust - of left thruster
        thrust - of right thruster

      • checkWorldBoundaryCollision

        public void checkWorldBoundaryCollision(float xMin,
                               float yMin,
                               float xMax,
                               float yMax)
        Checks whether world boundaries have been surpassed and takes an according action. In this case we warp around (one end to the other end).
        Parameters:
        xMin - world min x
        yMin - world min y
        xMax - world max x
        yMax - world max y

      • getAngularSpeed

        public double getAngularSpeed()
        Returns:
        angular speed value used for orientation change

      • getBatteryState

        public double getBatteryState()
        Returns:
        the current battery charge in percentage

      • getBitmapState

        public int getBitmapState()
        Returns:
        current bitmap to draw
        00 no thrust
        01 right thrust
        10 left thrust
        11 both thrusters
        100 legs out
        -1 crashed
        1100 shield and legs

      • getChargingSide

        public int getChargingSide()
        Returns:

        0 ... not charging
        1 ... right side charging
        2 ... left side charging

      • getCredits

        public int getCredits()
        Returns:
        credits currently available

      • getDistToClosest

        public float getDistToClosest()
        Returns:
        distance of Spaceship boundary to closest CelestialBody surface

      • getLookSpeed

        public float getLookSpeed()
        Returns:
        speed value used for translation in look direction

      • getOrientation

        public double getOrientation()
        Returns:
        direction in which taxi is looking, range [0,2pi[

      • getPassengerCount

        public int getPassengerCount()
        Returns:
        number of passengers currently in taxi

      • getShields

        public int getShields()
        Returns:
        number of shields left

      • getSpeed

        public float getSpeed()
        design note: we need this since in order to have responsive controls we don't have realistic momentum but always put our speed in look direction and thus can't put the effects of gravitation into that speed since then it would be possible to just rotate the momentum of gravity by looking somewhere else. so gravity translates independently. this implies that the speed value is not the actual displacement rate since it doesn't include the gravtiational effect. thus we calculate it from actual displacement per frame
        Returns:
        the actual speed determined as displacement per frame

      • getTargetPlanets

        public java.util.LinkedList<Planet> getTargetPlanets()
        Returns:
        list of target planets passengers intend to travel to

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Returns:
        x-coordinate of spaceship center

        public float getY()
        Returns:
        y-coordinate of spaceship center

      • isAngleOk

        public boolean isAngleOk()
        Returns:
        whether angle allows for safe landing

      • isCharging

        public boolean isCharging()
        Returns:
        true if taxi is currently charging battery

      • isCrashed

        public boolean isCrashed()
        Returns:
        whether we have crashed

      • isIkarused

        public boolean isIkarused()
        GameOver by crash with sun.
        Returns:
        true if crashed with sun

      • isLanded

        public boolean isLanded()
        Returns:
        whether we have landed safely

      • isOutOfBattery

        public boolean isOutOfBattery()
        Returns:
        whether or not we still have battery left

        Update the Spaceship, handles battery recharge, crash situation etc.
        Parameters:
        celestialBodies - collection of all CelestialBody in the level
